original_definition: 'deliverability' means the rate at which the storage facility user is entitled to withdraw gas from the storage facility;
generated_definition: 'deliverability' means the ability of a service or product to be delivered to the customer in a timely and efficient manner.

Article\u00a02: ‘deliverability’ means the rate at which the storage facility user is entitled to withdraw gas from the storage facility;
Article\u00a015: offer to storage facility users both bundled and unbundled services of storagespace,injectabilityanddeliverability.
